alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 10:47PM CDT until May 02 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno affecting Shelby, Rusk, San Augustine and Nacogdoches Counties. For the Attoyac Bayou...including Chireno...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Expect flooded paths and secondary roadways. Move livestock and equipment to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was forecast to be near 15 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 15.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.7 feet on 04/07/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday evening at 1045 PM CDT.
